qas.question: What known document tells of the death of Oleg?
What was prophesised by a sorcerer involving Oleg's death?
What does Oleg do to his horse?
What known document tells the birth of Oleg?

context: <a0_0><b4_0>The Chronicle<b4_0/><a0_0/> provides a mythic tale of Oleg's death. A sorcerer prophesies that the death of the Grand Prince would be associated with a <a1_0>certain horse<a1_0/>. Oleg <a2_0>has the horse sequestered<a2_0/>, and it later dies. Oleg goes to visit the horse and stands over the carcass, gloating that he had outlived the threat, when a snake strikes him from among the bones, and he soon becomes ill and dies. The Chronicle reports that <a3_0><b6_0>Prince Igor<b6_0/><a3_0/> succeeded <b7_0>Oleg<b7_0/> in <b5_0>913<b5_0/>, and after some brief conflicts with the Drevlians and the Pechenegs, a period of peace ensued for over twenty years.
